# destructive

**Type Property**

Equal to the default style.

## Declaration

```swift
static var destructive: UITableViewRowAction.Style { get }
```

## Styles

- **UITableViewRowAction.Style.default**: Apply the default style to the button.
- **UITableViewRowAction.Style.normal**: Apply a style that reflects standard non-destructive actions.

items.description: Apply the default style to the button.
